relationships.description: Narcissa Malfoy would not have let her precious son out of her sight willingly; Malfoy must have made a real effort to free himself from her clutches.
Harry was thinking too hard about D Raco's disappearance and was sure the reason could not be innocent.
Ron made a comment about D Raco's mother.
Hermione asked why D Raco was allowed to leave his mother's sight.
Narcissa Malfoy is D Raco's mother.
Mrs Weasley and Ginny were bending over the Pygmy Puffs together.
Mr Weasley was delightedly examining a pack of Muggle marked playing cards.
Fred and George were both helping customers.
Hagrid was standing with his back to them, looking up and down the street.
